name: Test total sum in shopping cart

steps.name: Find product and add to shopping cart

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b42bbc371d5c175e4732a269e6f08814)] -> css selector: [data-testid="plp-product-grid-item"]:first-child h2 a]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b42bbc371d5c175e4732a269e6f08814)] -> css selector: div[class="DropDown"][style="display:block"] a]

parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b42bbc371d5c175e4732a269e6f08814)] -> css selector: li[class="InStock"] a[class="dk_dropdown_option"]]
